alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Globe, Miami; Mazatzal Mountains; San Carlos; Southeast Gila County; Superior; Tonto Basin (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 13 at 1:44PM MST until February 15 at 2:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM TUESDAY TO 2 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Superior, Apache Junction/Gold Canyon, Tonto Basin, Mazatzal Mountains, San Carlos, Globe/Miami and Southeast Gila County. * WHEN...From 2 PM Tuesday to 2 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Difficult driving conditions, especially for larger vehicles traveling along roads with crosswinds. Light, unsecured objects may become airborne. Localized dense blowing dust with abrupt and dangerous restrictions to visibility will be possible.
info.instruction: A Wind Advisory means that sustained wind speeds of between 30 and 40 mph are expected, or wind gusts of between 40 and 58 mph. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. In addition, strong winds over desert areas could result in briefly lowered visibilities to well under a mile at times in blowing dust or blowing sand. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Globe, Miami; Mazatzal Mountains; San Carlos; Southeast Gila County; Superior; Tonto Basin
